serialPath.description: The path for serial communication with this MCU

name.description: The name of the control board

manufacturer.description: The name of the manufacturer of this board

firmwareBinaryName.description: The firmware binary filename in RatOS

compileScript.description: The path to the compilation script if the board supports automatic firmware compilation, relative to the board definition directory

flashScript.description: The path to the flashing script if the board supports automatic firmware flashing, relative to the board definition directory

flashInstructions.description: Instructions for how to make sure the board can be automatically flashed

documentationLink.description: Link to the RatOS configuration for this board

isToolboard.description: Whether this controlboard is a toolboard

isHost.description: Whether this is the host computer RatOS is running on (used for Pi)

disableAutoFlash.description: Whether to disable automatic flashing of this board

hasQuirksFiles.description: Whether this board has a quirks file that needs to be loaded (must be called quirks.cfg and quirks-toolboard.cfg)

driverCount.description: How many drivers this board has

integratedDrivers.description: Describes the drivers integrated on this board, if any

x.description: The driver for the X axis

y.description: The driver for the Y axis

z.description: The driver for the Z axis

z1.description: The driver for the Z axis

z2.description: The driver for the Z axis

extruder.description: The driver for the E axis

driverVoltages.description: The supported stepper voltages. 24, 36, 48, 56 and 60 is supported. Default is 24 only.

extruderlessConfig.description: The name of an extruderless config (used for 5 driver boards to support 6 driver printers)

fourPinFanConnectorCount.description: How many 4 pin fan connectors this board has

dfuBootImage.description: Path to a picture for locating the buttons and/or jumpers required to boot into DFU mode

flashDevice.description: A string containing the vendor and device id to use as the flash target, eg 0483:df11

instructions.description: Instruction steps for how to boot into DFU mode

hasBoot0Jumper.description: Whether this board has a boot0 jumper

sdFileName.description: The filename for the firmware binary when flashing via SD card
